page.title: 14AN ADULT'S DAY
page.content: At 6:00 Mr Hanke wakes up and gets washed and dressed.After breakfast he cleans his teeth,wakes his wife and catches the 7:00 bus to Cambridge.Soon he is buying meat and at 7:38 he arrives at the Botany School and inspects the Greenhouses and visits the growth rooms(places where plant Hormones are grown).Then he makes up a liquid to grow them in.Then he sterilizes and solidizes them.After that he talks to the students about their results.At 1:00 he runs to Jesus College and has lunch.Then he does some shopping.After he has sorted out plant embryoes at the Botany school he seals them and takes them back to the growth rooms.Soon he catches the bus. When he gets home he has supper and gets Will ready for bed.Then he works in the garden,has a cup of tea and at 11:00 he goes to bed.
